sentences.sContent: In April 1185, he began to muster an army .

synos.tran: 召集；对…进行点名；使振作
集合；检阅；点名册；集合人员

words.tran: 必须，一定；可以，应当；很可能
绝对必要的事物；未发酵葡萄汁

trans.tranCn: 召集；对…进行点名；使振作
trans.tranOther: if soldiers muster, or if someone musters them, they come together in a group

trans.tranCn: 集合；检阅；点名册；集合人员
trans.tranOther: a gathering together of soldiers so that they can be counted, checked etc
